about.title: About Us
about.intro: Diaspora & Azadî is a solidarity community formed by Kurdish activists to stand alongside refugees and migrants building a new life in the Netherlands.
about.challenge: Starting over in a new country is not easy. We have walked this path and experienced these challenges. That's why we're here: so that every individual new to the Netherlands doesn't have to go through this process alone, has access to information, and can participate strongly in society.
about.movement: As a liberating and grassroots movement primarily composed of peoples from Turkey and Kurdistan, we center solidarity and collective power.
about.vision: We envision a society where all migrants and refugees living in the Netherlands exist as individuals who know their rights, raise their voices, stand on their own feet, and contribute to society.
about.mission: To overcome together the obstacles faced by people in the asylum and migration process, discover opportunities, and provide practical support and guidance so everyone can realize their potential. While doing this, we collaborate with various civil society organizations, local initiatives, and solidarity networks.

offers.title: Asylum and Legal Processes
offers.description: Up-to-date information, experience sharing, and proper guidance

offers.title: Education and Career Support
offers.description: Diploma recognition, language training, job search, and guidance on professional development

offers.title: Social Integration
offers.description: Understanding the Dutch system, learning rights, and active citizenship support

offers.title: Community and Solidarity
offers.description: Experience sharing, cultural events, and a warm community that makes you feel you're not alone

offers.title: Collaborations and Events
offers.description: Joint projects with civil society organizations, municipalities, and other platforms

about.contactText: Do you have questions? Need support? Or want to join our community? You can reach us through our contact page or follow us on social media.

emergency.title: Emergency
emergency.subtitle: Important emergency numbers and support lines in the Netherlands
emergency.emergencyDescription: Police, Ambulance, Fire Department - Call in life-threatening situations
emergency.listeningLineDesc: If you need someone to talk to
emergency.fierDesc: Victims of human trafficking and violence
emergency.importantNoteDesc: In life-threatening situations, always call 112. The numbers on this page are valid throughout the Netherlands. Some lines also offer support in languages other than Dutch.
